name: node
title: Node.js
description: I use Node.js as a runtime environment for JavaScript on the backend. This allows me to create fast and efficient applications.

name: js
title: JavaScript
description: I use JavaScript to add interactivity to web pages, including drop-down menus and form validation.

name: css
title: CSS
description: I use CSS to design and style web pages, ensuring they are attractive and easy to use.

name: html
title: HTML5
description: I use HTML to structure the content of web pages, including elements such as headings, paragraphs, and lists.

name: react
title: React.js
description: I use React to build dynamic and reusable user interfaces in my web applications.

name: express
title: Express.js
description: I use Express.js as a framework to develop web applications in Node.js, accelerating backend development and the creation of RESTful APIs.

name: postgresql
title: PostgreSql
description: I use PostgreSQL as a relational database in my web applications, guaranteeing efficiency and security in data manipulation.

name: trello
title: Trello
description: I use Trello as an agile project management tool to organize tasks and collaborate with teams effectively.

name: tailwindcss
title: Tailwind CSS
description: I use Tailwind CSS to design modern, customizable user interfaces using predefined classes.

name: java
title: Java
description: I use Java to develop robust and scalable business applications and backend systems.

name: figma
title: Figma
description: I use Figma as a UI design and prototyping tool to create coherent and engaging experiences.

name: postman
title: Postman
description: I use Postman as an API client to test, develop and document web services in my projects.

name: ejs
title: EJS
description: I use EJS as a templating engine in Node.js to generate dynamic views with a mix of HTML and JavaScript.

name: sequelize
title: Sequelize ORM
description: I use Sequelize as an ORM in Node.js to interact with relational databases in an intuitive and efficient way.

name: git
title: Git & GitHub
description: I use Git for version control and GitHub to host and collaborate on my web projects, making it easy to manage changes and collaborate with other developers.

title: MySql
description: I use MySQL as a database management system in my web projects, guaranteeing efficiency and security in data manipulation.
